short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restore direct map access from Google Search results with one click, bypassing recent EU regulation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a game-changer for anyone who misses the old way of jumping directly to maps from their search results. It brings back the simplicity and efficiency of navigating the web, making it a must-have for your browser. Whether you're planning your daily commute, exploring new places, or simply need quick directions, this extension ensures you're always just one click away from the maps you need.

There's no complicated setup required; simply add the extension to your browser and you're good to go. It instantly integrates a 'View in Maps' button into your Google searches, making map access from search results effortless.

We value your privacy and digital safety, which is why this extension operates without sending your data anywhere. Everything stays between you and your browser, ensuring a secure and private experience.

The creators of this extension are Radim Motyƒçka and Samuel Seidel.
